title: Chapter 2269 - Chapter 2269: The Fox Rushes Into The Screen, The Old Sword Spits Out A New Edge (3)
body:
Chapter 2269 - Chapter 2269: The Fox Rushes Into The Screen, The Old Sword Spits Out A New Edge (3)

Chapter 2269: The Fox Rushes Into the Screen, The Old Sword Spits Out a New Edge (3)

Translator: Nyoi-Bo Studio Editor: Nyoi-Bo Studio

The array that covered the Land of Screen and Candles was torn apart by a cold force in an instant and revealed the dark scenery inside.

Following that, a cry of surprise erupted. ,

“Wow! Hua Changdeng! Were you pretending to be asleep so that you could peep at the ceremony?”

“Come out and play together. It’s so lively outside. It just so happened that you’re the missing bit.”

“Oh right, there’s also Elder Yu who will perform a wave of fishing for you on the spot. I wonder what he can catch… Hehe.”

Everyone outside the arena was dumbfounded.

Not only did this guy tear apart the seal of Land of Screen and Candles, he even dared to tease Hua Changdeng?

Elder Yu stood outside and blew out his beard in anger.

Fishing?

This vixen was too cunning. He even got people into trouble. This was really not a coordinated attack that had been planned in advance!

He hurriedly retreated.

Once the seal was removed, everyone could not suppress their curiosity and went inside.

Under the dim sky, there was a broken willow tree, an old table, and a shattered lamp.

As for the swordsman who leaned against the God Worship Willow Tree among the legendary Nine Ancestral Trees, he held a long sword that was pitted with holes. He looked downward and said in a hoarse voice.

“Get lost!”

The sound of that one word filled the entire place with a murderous aura.

Everyone felt chills down their spines. They realized that this was not a joke. Hua Changdeng really had a killing intent. Yue Gongli scratched his head and said.

“Get lost?”

“How? Where are you going? Do you want to come out with me?”

“Aiya, Ancient Swordsmen are so annoying… Pretend, just keep up the pretense! Would it kill you to say another word? If I don’t get lost, will you kill me… Yayaya, I’m looking forward to it!”

The foxy man replied with a barrage of words. His eyes narrowed into slits again. He rubbed his hands, stuck out his butt, and even shook it.

“Come on, come on, kill me, Little Deng…”

“F*ck…” A low exclamation sounded outside the arena. It was unknown who had said it, but it vividly expressed everyone’s feelings at the moment.

Hua Changdeng didn’t say much. He looked up, and the dark Land of Screen and Candles seemed to light up with a beam that was ready to devour people.

Sizzle!

The black sword energy was like a snake that spread out from the Land of Screen and Candles in the form of twisted patterns.

Black mist suddenly rose from the Saint Mountain, and the wails of ghosts echoed in the depths of everyone’s souls.

They sounded like fingernails that raked against a wooden board and instantly caused everyone to break out in goosebumps.

“F*ck, are you serious?” Yue Gongli’s face froze. He turned around and ran. “Elder Yu, help me!”

“Enough…” Dao Qiongcang let out a long sigh and his brows furrowed. For a moment, he was in a daze and was not sure if they had appointed the right person.

He moved the divine Sinan in his hand, and the seal that had been torn apart was resealed and trapped the Land of Screen and Candles.

“Bang!”

However, in the next second, the seal exploded again.

The stream of black light flashed in the air. It was actually sword energy and it was a hundred times faster than the previous attack.

“Hiss!”

Yue Gongli took a deep breath. He realized that this tough guy was not to be trifled with, so he blocked the attack with his hand.

“Yin Aura Door.”

A blurry and dim door appeared in front of him. It seemed to lead to the Yin Cao netherworld and was extremely dark and cold.

As soon as it appeared, the temperature on the Saint Mountain dropped sharply, and a layer of ice crystals even formed on the ground.

However, at the same time…

Everyone’s eyes were very sharp. They saw that in the Land of Screen and Candles, where the seal had been ripped apart again, the old figure had already sheathed his sword.

“Ahhh!”

Yue Gongli screamed in pain, and his body was split into two. He transformed into a streak of spiritual light and died.

“It hurts!”

“It hurts!”

“The pain will kill me!”

Everyone was shocked.

Yue Gongli had already died. Where then did this mocking voice come from? Why did it sound like it came from behind…

Everyone looked behind them.

They saw a smiling vixen whose eyes narrowed as he walked over from the horizon. He applauded as he spoke.

When everyone noticed his presence, he changed his remarks.

“Good sword, good sword!”

“But Xiao Deng, have you been lying down for too long that your old eyes became blurry? Why can’t you even see my little clone?”

“Could it be that I was too strong? Oh, no, you’re the one who’s crippled!”

The figure behind the screen trembled slightly and tightened his grip on the sword in his hand.

“You two, enough!”

Dao Qiongcang couldn’t take it anymore. They created such a scene in public!

He shouted angrily and casually wrapped the seal around the Land of Screen and Candles.

“Great Capture Technique!”

He grabbed at the air again, and the foxlike eyes covered in the mink sable was caught in his hand and could not resist.

Even Hallmaster Dao was furious?

Everyone below trembled in fear.

However, Yue Gongli’s body went limp, and his hands became weak. He still said.

“Oh no, I’ve been caught!”

Dao Qiongcang’s eyelids twitched violently, and he threw the fellow behind him.

“From now on, you either shut up or scram back to your secret realm.” He growled softly at him.

Yue Gongli clammed up immediately, but he squirmed about on Dao Qiongcang’s body and waved to the red-clothed people below.

The hearts of the red-clothed people jumped. This was even more exciting than killing ghost beasts.

Yue Gongli couldn’t keep quiet. When Dao Qiongcang wasn’t paying attention, he made a heart sign above his head and whispered to everyone. “The moon and the path are fused, there’s no drop in the world.”

“Shut up!”

“Oh. ”

The Ninth Divine Priest God looked away and had a headache. She had clearly not done anything, but she was already exhausted.

She announced weakly.

“Next is the Ruler of the white-clothed people…”

Initially she was quite enthusiastic, but now, the Ninth Divine Priest was too lazy to keep the people in suspense.

“Beibei. ”

A young woman dressed in white descended from the sky. She looked like one of the Chief of the six divisions and held a huge sword case in her hand. It was taller than her and looked like a coffin.

She looked curiously at Yue Gongli with her big eyes. When she saw the man waving his hand vigorously, she couldn’t help but wave back.

“I love you!” Yue Gongli smiled. “Little girl, you’re so cute. You’ll cry for a long time after a punch, won’t you?”

“What..?” Beibei was taken aback. She quickly drew back, unable to endure this middle-aged man’s evil vibe.

“Shut up.” Dao Qiongcang turned his head and scolded him.

“No, I don’t care.” Yue Gongli responded in a low voice and turned to look at Yu Zhiwen. Just as he was about to raise his face to admire the beauty, he received a murderous look from Elder Yu. He immediately pursed his lips and looked away.

The Ninth Divine Priest caught a glimpse of this scene out of the corner of her eye and sighed.

“And…”

“One of the new three emperors, Dao Xuanji.”

Yue Gongli’s handsome face darkened, and his foxlike eyes dimmed. He patted

Dao Qiongcang’s shoulder and said.

“I’ll leave first. You guys can continue to chat..”
